definitions.definition: An unseen ghost which makes noises and causes disruption , especially by causing physical objects to move or fly about.
examples: A poltergeist haunts the house by moving objects around, making chain-rattling noises and throwing things.
The chapel is haunted by a demonic poltergeist .

main_definition: ( parapsychology ) An unseen ghost which makes noises and causes disruption , especially by causing physical objects to move or fly about.
